legal_framework.reference: Judicially evolved through Supreme Court rulings

applicable_scenarios: Social welfare and public interest issues
steps: Draft PIL petition naming public interest cause
File in High Court (under Article 226) or Supreme Court (Article 32)
Court issues notices or seeks response from State/public authority
Court issues directions (e.g., policy change, enforcement)

fees.court_fee: Nominal or waived for public welfare cases

relief_available: Writs: mandamus, prohibition, certiorari, habeas corpus

special_provisions.relaxed_standing: Anyone can file on behalf of public

important_notes: Subjective filter applied to prevent misuse
Focus on systemic issues rather than individual grievance
